org.gvsig.timesupport

Interface EditableRelativeInstant

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Cloneable, Instant, RelativeInstant, Time
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultEditableRelativeInstant

    public interface EditableRelativeInstant
extends RelativeInstant

    The RelativeInstant ins inmutable, but sometimes is necessary to edit it. This class is an editable copy of a realtive instant that cab be edited.

    A huge part of the documentation of this class has been retrieved from the joda-time library.

    See Also:
    http://joda-time.sourceforge.net, https://gvsig.org/web/projects/gvsig-desktop/docs/devel/org-gvsig-sensors/1-0.0/analysis-and-design/detailed-view/time-support/libraries/org-gvsig-timesupport-lib

    • Method Detail

      • setTime

        void setTime(int hour,
           int minuteOfHour,
           int secondOfMinute,
           int millisOfSecond)
        Set the time from fields. The date part of this object will be unaffected.
        Parameters:
        hour - the hour
        minuteOfHour - the minute of the hour
        secondOfMinute - the second of the minute
        millisOfSecond - the millisecond of the second
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the value is invalid

      • setDate

        Parameters:

        monthOfYear - the month of the year
        dayOfMonth - the day of the month
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the value is invalid
